headline: Lennar Announces Preliminary Results of Exchange Offer
summary: Lennar Corporation (NYSE: LEN and LEN.B) ("Lennar") announced today that, based on preliminary results, its previously announced offer to exchange up to 33,298,764 shares of Millrose Properties, Inc. (NYSE: MRP) ("Millrose") Class A stock it owns (approximately 20% of the total outstanding Millrose stock) for outstanding shares of Lennar Class A common stock (the "Exchange Offer") was oversubscribed. The Exchange Offer expired at 12:00 midnight, New York City time, on November 21, 2025 (the "Exp
